response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which we believe is worth every penny of its $1,200,000 value to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. Considering its unique features and unparalleled benefits, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This represents a significant savings compared to its market value, making this an attractive opportunity for you. We understand that such a high-value transaction requires careful consideration, and we are here to answer any questions or provide additional information to ensure you make the most informed decision. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this special offer.", "product_price": 950000}
